    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="es">Proporcionalidad geométrica</string>
            <string language="en">Geometric ratio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrisches Verhältnis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Taux géométrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relação geométrica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto geometrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωμετρική αναλογία</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de proporcionalidad geométrica. Se estudian los teoremas de Thales, del cateto y de la altura.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of geometric proportionality. It studies Thales's theorem, the theorem of the cathetus and the theorem of the altitude</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cateto</string>
            <string language="en">cathetus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">proporcionalidad</string>
            <string language="en">proportionality</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Thales</string>
            <string language="en">Thales's theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">altura</string>
            <string language="en">altitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der geometrischen Proportionatität zu 
erklären. Sie studiert Theorem Thaless, das Theorem des 
cathetus und das Theorem der Höhe</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la proportionnalité 
géométrique. Elle étudie le théorème de Thales, le 
théorème du cathetus et le théorème de l'altitude</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito do proportionality geométrico. Estuda o theorem de 
Thales, o theorem do cathetus e o theorem da altura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto della proporzionalità geometrica. Studia 
il teorema del Thales, il teorema del cathetus ed il teorema 
dell'altezza</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της γεωμετρικής αναλογικότητας. 
Μελετά το θεώρημα Thales, το θεώρημα του cathetus και 
το θεώρημα του ύψους</string>
          </description>
